answer:
QUESTION

I recently had a misscariage, and according to the fatwa on ask_imam.org, since the the body was not formed (early miscarriage) i considered the bleeding after as haidh, and 10 days later did ghusl.

I carried on bleeding and have regarded this as istihadha. My question is that if after my 15th day (counting from when i did ghusl) i carry on bleeding, should i count it as haidh again? (even though the bleeding is light)

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

Your understanding is correct.

And Allah Ta'ala Knows Best


Wassalam



Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
